195b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyag gcig gis mkhyen pa ma yin gyi/ gzhan du char 'bab pa bzhin te/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas med pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyang bdag nyid nges par mi sgrol
195b4(mdo sde): gyi rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum du nges par sgrol ba ra rig par bya'o// gzhan yang btsun pa skye bu la la na ga zla ba dang nyi ma mthong nas/ khyim gyi nang du
195b5(mdo sde): zhugs nas de gnyis kyis mi mthong ngo snyam du sems na/ ci zla ba dang nyi mas mi mthong ngam/ mthong mod kyis mi ma mkhas pa khyim gyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu zla ba
195b6(mdo sde): dang nyi mas mi mthong ngo snyam du sems te/ de bzhin du btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu yang mi mkhas pa bzhin ma zer cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu sems can rnams nges
195b7(mdo sde): par sgrol te/ rtag tu sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dzin du 'jug/ de'i phyir gang zag log par nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa ste/ ma
195b8(mdo sde): nges pa zhes bya ba gsum pa medo// smras pa/ 'jig rten pa la yang tshul khrims lnga yod do// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dus na yang yod// smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi ba
196a1(mdo sde): de skad ma zer cig/ ci tsam chos dang 'thun pa'i tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang yon tan 'jig rten na 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dag yod pa de dag thams
196a2(mdo sde): cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig rab tu rig par bya'o// smras pa/ nad pa lta bu'i gtam rnam pa gsum ste/ nad pa kha cig sman pa rnyed na 'tsho ba yod do// nad pa kha cig sman pa
196a3(mdo sde): ma red kyang 'tsho ba yod do// nang pa kha cig ni sman pa ni/ da kyang mi 'tsho ba yod ngo do// smras pa/ na ba gsum du med de/ na ba kha cig sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho'o// na ba kha cig sman
196a4(mdo sde): pa rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ste/ gsor rung ba dang / gsor mi rung ba dang rnam pa gnyis// smras pa/ gsum ma yin te/ nad pa kha cig ni sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba yod do// 
196a5(mdo sde): nad pa kha cig ni sman pa dang g.yog rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ba yod do// gal te sman med na sman pas kyang ci zhig bya/ nad pa gang sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba de sman pa rnyed na/ ji ltar
196a6(mdo sde): 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/ rgyu gcig gis sman pa bya ba shes pa ma yin gyi zas mi bza' ba'i cho ga btang ba yang sheso// gal te thams cad mi shes na dus ma yin par 'tsho
196a7(mdo sde): bas shi bar 'gyur// de'i phyir nad pa gsor rung ba dang / gsor mi rung ba ste/ sman pa yang rnyed sman dang g.yog rnyed kyang / gal te 'chi na de don med pa'i gnas 'gyuraro// 
196a8(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sman dang g.yog dang sman pa yang ma rnyed sman pa rnyed la/ sman ma rnyed pa ste/ de'i phyir sman pa dang / sman rnyed kyang mi 'tsho na/ sman dang sman pa'i bye brag kyang
196b1(mdo sde): mngon ci'i phyir tshe'i rig byed las lus lji ba dang / yang ba'i bya ba thams cad 'byung ste/ de'i phyir btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gsor rung yang rung la/ mi rung yang mi rung zhes bya bar
196b2(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum du rtog pa rnam gsum med do// de ni nyan thos kyi shes pa ste/ sbrang bu lta bu shes pa'o zhes mkhas pa rnams 'dzer to// mi mkhas pa rnams kyi phyir rnam pa gnyis
196b3(mdo sde): su brtags te/ de la log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chen po'o// yang dag par nges pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyaso// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi ngo mtshar rnam pa
196b4(mdo sde): gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dod chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gnas ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs
196b5(mdo sde): ba las mtho ba'i gnas gzhan mi gangar ste ngo mtshar to// dma' ba'i gnas su yang 'dod mangs las gzhan mi snang // dper na bzhin gshegs pa'i lan thos
196b6(mdo sde): rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa ba cu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro'o// dper na
196b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag gi bu dang / mig dang / sha bye bo'i phung po ri rab pas che bde bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin
196b8(mdo sde): 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dod chen pa'ang na ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du song ba de'i tshe der g.yem pa'i sems skye ste/ 
197a1(mdo sde): // de'i tshe myur du bud med mang po 'byung ste/ bu mang po yang 'byung ste/ sems tsam gyis bde ba lnga 'thob par ga la 'gyur/ de nas myur du bdag gi bu bza' ba'i sem
197a2(mdo sde): skyes nas za'o// yang las kyis bram ze'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ de slong ba rnams la yang bu byin te/ sbyin pa de dag kyang bza'o// yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad za ste/ 
197a3(mdo sde): ltar 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bye'o// de'i phyir mthon pa gan
197a4(mdo sde): kyi mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so// dpa' ba'i gnas na ni 'dod chen pa rnam so// btsun pa mo'u/ dgal gyi bu de ltar ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te/ 
197a5(mdo sde): log par nges pa'i gang zag ni 'dod chen po yin par sems shig/ yang dag par nges pa'i gang zag ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin
197a6(mdo sde): par soms shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i 'phreng ba la bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba tshur shog/ myur du rab tu byung la skyabs gsum du 'gro ba zung
197a7(mdo sde): shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas slar gsol pa/ theg pa 'di ni theg chen te// chags med ye shes zhes kyang bgyi// theg pa
197a8(mdo sde): gcig po skyabs gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs// chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// dge 'dun de bzhin
197b1(mdo sde): gshegs kyi ming ka/ dge 'dun gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs// chos dang dge 'dun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thabs med skyabs dang
197b2(mdo sde): don dam skyabs// de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs lags te// de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs la skyabasu 'chi// ji ltar shing kun za 'dod pas ni shing
197b3(mdo sde): kun bza' ba zhes// shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos ma za ba ni// 'jig rten dag na bdag la mi phan nod kyang sos mi 'gyur// 'jig rten de 'dra'i phyugs
197b4(mdo sde): ming sman pa stong gis gso mi nus// de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs btang ste// thabs kyi skyabasu gang dag 'jug pa yang // de lta bu'i sbrang bu gzhan med de// de na
197b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyo da gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ de nas
197b6(mdo sde): sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di ska da ces gsol to// 'jig rten na gzhon nu gang lags/ ba snyan pa rdzogs pa gang lags/ 'jig rten na dag
197b7(mdo sde): sbyong gsal ba gang lags/ 'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la
197b8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten skyabs gcig po/ don dam pa'i skyabasu ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po la babad do// de gnyis
198a1(mdo sde): / 'jig rten na skyabs lags te/ gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa mi gsal ba de dag dge sbyong lags sam gang skyabs gcig po ma 'tshal ba de dag stsa
198a2(mdo sde): sbyor bar lta ga la 'gyur/ gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam pa'i skyab su ma 'tshal ba de dag thog ma nas skyabasu 'gro ba yang ma sbyangs na dge sbyong du lta ga la 'gyur// de ltar
198a3(mdo sde): skyabasu mchi ba'ang gsal bar ma 'tshal na/ sbyin gnasu lta ga la 'gyur/ gang skyabs dang thabs kyi skyabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de dag ni 'jig rten gzhon nu mi
198a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
198a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bdag ni srog gcod pa spang sa pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin gyi/ nya ba ltar srog ga dpa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to// srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon
198a6(mdo sde): mongs pa bye ba ste/ nga dag bzung nas gang gsod pa de ni 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'dzin pa'o// de yang bsad pa'am yang na rgyags pa bcom ste/ bdag gi slob mar bgyi'o// 
198a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas slar 'di skad
198a8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bdag ni brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin to// chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/ bdag ni mi bden par smra ba'i chos ston to// de ni sangs rgyas
198b1(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang brdzun zhes bgyi'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
198b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang 'thun pa'i rjesu 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o// bdag 'jig rten du skye ste rab tu byung zhing bstan pa rdzogs nas/ bdag
198b3(mdo sde): gis dgra bcom pa thob bo// gzhan gyi sbyin pa'i dngos po la spyad do// bdag 'jig rten na 'chag go// bdag gi ni rmi dgu nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o// bdag lham 'tshal lo// bdag
198b4(mdo sde): gis so shing blang ngo // bdag gis mig rtsi byugo/ ba dag sgom// bdag gnyid mchog go// bdag gi mgo bregaso// / bdag mal du zhugs te nya lo// rkeng pa na ba zhig byung // 
198b5(mdo sde): bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rlung dang / 'dus pa zhig byung ste/ bdag gis sman btung ngo // bdag ni shing zad nga'i me bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la
198b6(mdo sde): sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni mo bden pa ste/ ji tsam du thabs kyis bya ba dang / 'jig rten na thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongs su spyod pa'i bar du brdzun smra ba'i tshul khrims
198b7(mdo sde): mi sbyong ngo // de kho na'i chos bden pa'i chos rab tu bshad kyis nga las nyon cig/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag
198b8(mdo sde): pa nyid don dam pa'i sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ ther zug gi sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ zhi
199a1(mdo sde): ba'i sku don dam pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ de kho na las skyes pa'i sku de ji ltar ston/ de bas na mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa thams
199a2(mdo sde): cad ni mi bden pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na sangs rgyas shes bya'o// dper na ba lang rdzi dag be'u shi ba'i pags pas be'u ltar byas te brid nas/ be'u gzhan len tu 'jug pa de bzhin
199a3(mdo sde): du 'jig rten gyi rjesu 'brang zhing spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas ni 'an pa lta bur gyur nas chos ston te/ ba lang rdzi dang / ba ltar 'on pa rnams kyang bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs
199a4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa yang 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o snyam ste shin tu dga'o// bcom ldan 'das
199a5(mdo sde): kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing bdag cag kyang 'a jig rten gtso bor 'gyuraro// snyam du sem so// chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid skul te/ de bzhin
199a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so// gal te be'u dngos por slar bstan na/ bzhor yang mi rung / len tu yang
199a7(mdo sde): mi rung ste/ ba lang rdzis be'u gsob bstan te/ rtsa spar gang sbyin nas mi bden pa'i chos la dul bar byed do// de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyis ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i sku 'jig rten du
199a8(mdo sde): brtan du zin na/ ska de sus mthong bar nus te/ ji ltar ba lang rtsi'i chang ba lhur 'jig rten thams cad kyis rjesu 'brang ba'i byed pas chos rnams bden pa ma yin no// de bas na
199b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yan lag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams chos la rtsom par sems can mang po yongasu smin par mdzad de// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid // ngo
199b2(mdo sde): phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod de/ ji tsam du sems can thams cad mi bden pa// yin pa de tsam du bdag kyang brdzun smra ba spang ba'i chos mi 'dzin te/ de'i tshe bdag gi
199b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng
199b4(mdo sde): bas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas gso la pa/ chang spong ba'i tshul khrims bdag mi 'dzin// chang las myos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin// chang 'thungs
199b5(mdo sde): pa ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod// 'gro 'chag rtag tu rang bde chang zhes bgyi// bde gshegs snying po theg pa che las skyes// khu ba 'brangs nas skyes bu ngoms par 'gyur/ 
199b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rtag brtan ther zug ces// rab tu dga' ngoms ha ha legs brjod pa// phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
199b7(mdo sde): 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spong ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol
199b8(mdo sde): to// bdag ni 'khrig spangs pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin// rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med g.yem chags 'dzin// ba dan lta bur smad 'tshong khyim na spyod// bud med kun gyi drang da'ang rab tu
200a1(mdo sde): // chags/ ting 'dziran ro na bdag gi chung ma ste// chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bud med chags// dpa' zhing bden la dga' ba bdag gi bu// snying rje byams pa ba mo mang po ste/ 
200a2(mdo sde): stong pa 'ang ni bdag gi khyim lags so// mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa bdag gi mal// nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi g.yog lags te// zas ni ldem ngag gsang ba bstan pa lags/ 
200a3(mdo sde): bdag gi bskyed mos tshal ni gzungs rnams te// byang chub yan lag me tog dag gis brgyan// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste// bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni sdong po lags/ 
200a4(mdo sde): de la sogs pa khyim gnas rtse dga' mchog/ byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ma lags// 'di ni mkhas pa rnam sa kyi rang bzhin chos// bcom ldan 'das kyis
200a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phre nga bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang pas
200a6(mdo sde): slar gsol pa// bdag ni ma byin len spongs khrims mi 'dzin// gzhan don rku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin// ma byin pa ni byang chub lags shes bgyi// de ni sus kyang su la'ang ma
200a7(mdo sde): stsal te/ byang chub shing drung bcom ldan bzhugs nas kyang // khyod kyis rnyed pa med cing bshog pa'ang med// de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te// de ni bla na med pa'i chos
200a8(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod gar dang / rol mo spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i
200b1(mdo sde): 'phreng bas tshigs bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni gar mkhan bzhin du rtag tu gar bgyid de// dri za'i dbyangs snyar sgrog cing glu blangs bro rdung ste// leg so legaso de bzhin
200b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po sngon// legs brjod gar bgyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos// mi sbyin lta bur sgra snyan thog chen mdo sde klag/ mi 'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rnga bran dang / 
200b3(mdo sde): sil slar ngag gis glegs bam la'ang mchod par bgyi// sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchod bgyid pa// de dag 'jig rten da ni khor mor mi gcig par/ phyi dus sa
200b4(mdo sde): rgyas 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pa gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod gcig ci shes slobs shig/ sor mo'i 'brang
200b5(mdo sde): bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to// / ci gcig zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni zas la garas zhes/ nyan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba'i tshig ste/ 
200b6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchi so// theg pa chen po pa rnams ni rtag tu mig mi 'dzums shing brtan pa'o// ci gcig zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
200b7(mdo sde): pa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// ci gnyis gang zhe na/ ming dang gzugs kyi tshig nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ba ste/ theg pa chen po la ma lag so// ming dang gzugs ni de lta lags
200b8(mdo sde): teming dang gzugs rnam pa gzhan ma lag so// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa ni ming tsam ste/ gzugs dang dbyibs mi rig go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
201a1(mdo sde): // 'das rnams kyi bar pa ni lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i gzugs bzhin no// ci gsum zhe na/ tshor ba gsum nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ste/ theg pa chen po pa rnam
201a2(mdo sde): kyi ma lag so// tshor ba 'di gsum ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog la mi rtag par 'gyuraro// zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dam pa'i chos nub
201a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dge 'dun mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba ste/ de gsum theg pa chen po'i tshor ba'o// 
201a4(mdo sde): bzhi zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la de lta bu ma mchi so// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang byed pa
201a5(mdo sde): rnams ni bden pa bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag ce sa bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po la shin tu bden pa ste/ sdug ba sngal ni bden pa ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs
201a6(mdo sde): pa ther zugo// zhes bgyi ba de ni shin tu bden te/ kun 'byung ba ni ma lagaso// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zug gi mchog go zhes bgyi ba ni shin tu bden gyi 'gog pa ni ma
201a7(mdo sde): lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni shin tu bden gyi lam ma yin te/ theg pa chen po la 'phags pa'i bden pa de bzhi'o// sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden pa ma lagaso// 
201a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden du lags na/ sdug bsngal rnams bzhi bden par 'gyur te/ dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi de
201b1(mdo sde): ngag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir 'gyur ro// ci lnga gang zhe na/ dbang po lnga zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la ni ma lag so// dbang po lnga ni de bzhin gsheg
201b2(mdo sde): pa rtag pa gsal bar blta'o// zhes ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni mig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes thos nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'o// de bzhin ga
201b3(mdo sde): pa rtag pa'i dri bsdams nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni snga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ro myangs nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni lce'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
201b4(mdo sde): chos kyi sku'o zhes/ skra de ro'i mchog thos shing reg nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni lus so// ci drug ce na/ skye mched drug ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig
201b5(mdo sde): ste/ theg pa chen po la skye mched drug gi rnam pa 'di med// / skye mched drug ces bya ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa / ga pa gsal bar blta ba'o zhes 'ong ba'i sgo nas
201b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni mig gi skye mchedado// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag zhes thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'i skye mched // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
201b7(mdo sde): po'i rtag pa'i dri thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni sna'i skye mched do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de
201b8(mdo sde): ni lce'i skye mchedado// gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes sku de'i blo dam pa nyan pa dang / reg pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lus kyi skye mched do// gang de
202a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba gsal bar ston pa la 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems kyis rdzogs par dad pa 'ong ba'i sgo'i skye mched de ni yid kyi skye mched ngo // ci
202a2(mdo sde): bdun zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grogs pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la yang bdun po de dag u dum 'bar ra'i me tog rgyas pa bzhin du rnyed par
202a3(mdo sde): dka' ba'i tshig byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas shin tu me tog rgyas pa bdun na// ci brgyad ce na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
202a4(mdo sde): brgyad ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di las kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po yang dag par lta ba la so// 
202a5(mdo sde): pa'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog go zhes rab tu ston pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos shing rna
202a6(mdo sde): bar reg pa tsam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam yang dag par 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa'i ther zug g.yung drung gi mchog bsnyil bar gyur pa/ 
202a7(mdo sde): shis pa ni sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rga ba med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin
202a8(mdo sde): par rig par bya'o// ci dgu zhe na/ mdo sde yan lag dgu pa zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes theg pa
202b1(mdo sde): gcig ces bya'o// ci bcu zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
202b2(mdo sde): bcu ma yin gyi/ mtha' yas pa'i stobs shes bya'o// de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam du med pa ste/ stobs mtha' yas par mnga'
202b3(mdo sde): ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mdo sde mtha' yas pa ldem po ngag tu ston pa'o// 'di ni lam gcig po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig/ skyabs gcig/ 
202b4(mdo sde): bden pa gcig gi phyir 'brang ba/ khams gcig pa/ 'gro ba gcig pa/ kha dog gcig pa ste/ de bas na theg pa gcig ces bya'o// gzhan ni thabs kyi bya ba'o// de nas bcom
202b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la legs so// sa bya ba byin te/ leg so leg so sor mo'i 'phreng ba leg so// / sor mo'i 'breng ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pas dag
202b6(mdo sde): slong sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod tshur shog/ dge slong sa ra mo'i 'phreng ba khyod tshur shog/ ces bka' stsal pa dang // sor mo'i 'phreng ba dge slong lo mang du lon pa bzhin
202b7(mdo sde): du thams cad dge slong dang 'thun par spyod lam mdzes par gyur to// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
202b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du mchi'o zhes kha'i sgo nas tshig byung ma thag tu der 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba tshur shog/ 
203a1(mdo sde): // 'dze ta'i tshal du sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du 'dong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba dang thabs gcig tu shA ri'i bu dang / me'u
203a2(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pas mdun du bdar cing // bskor te/ na mkha' la zla ba nya ba gzas bskor ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shing ma
203a3(mdo sde): ngan med pa'i drung nas/ nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sor mo'i 'bring ba rtsod pa'i sa nas/ 'dze ta'i tshal gyi bar du gnag pa'i dgongs
203a4(mdo sde): bzhi bcur 'dom gang med pa'i bar du gsheg so// de na sa sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
203a5(mdo sde): pos mchod pa cher byas te/ 'dze ta'i tshal du 'ongaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
203a6(mdo sde): dga' ra bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugaso// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil bzhin du gyur cing / 
203a7(mdo sde): gos ka tsa lin da ka ltar reg na bde ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du gyur to// de nas phyogs thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sor mo'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
203a8(mdo sde): deng de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa seng ge'i stag chen po dang / thabs mo chen po bkye nas sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing chos kyi gtam ston te/ sor mo'i 'phreng
203b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig ces bkye ste/ sor me'i 'brang ba bltar lhag so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
203b2(mdo sde): phyogs cha gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs cha de dang de nas me tog sil ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi char bab bo// sems can gang dang gang dag gis pad+mo'i dri la reg par gyur pa'i
203b3(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa med par gyur to// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / lha
203b4(mdo sde): bu mo mang pos lha'i mchod pa mang po byas te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshigasu bcad pas 'di skad ces smra so// brgyad
203b5(mdo sde): bzhi mtshan 'chang yon tan rgya che mnga'// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du zhal yang mdzes// na mkha' la ni zla ba ma dzes pa ltar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag
203b6(mdo sde): 'tsha long thub pa dam pa bdun mtho gzugs mchog mnga'// byams mchog phan pa'i yon tan mang po 'chang // pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla
203b7(mdo sde): ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// rtag dge mtshungs med mchog yangs yon mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog
203b8(mdo sde): rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// na mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// brtan dge mtshungs med mchog yangs yon tan mang
204a1(mdo sde): // thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// na mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/ mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// 
204a2(mdo sde): ther zug dge mchog yon tan rgya chen mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// na mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/ 
204a3(mdo sde): mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshalo// zhi dge mtshungs med mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha mo mchog gis mchod// pad+ma rgyas pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i
204a4(mdo sde): zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod 'chang tshul khrim sa yon tan mtha' yas chang // sor mo'i 'brang thogs
204a5(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshalo// theg pa gcig 'dzin theg pa chen po ston// byams 'chang sor 'phreng khyod la phyag 'a tsha lo// mtha' yas lus 'dzin dag kyang mtha' yas
204a6(mdo sde): 'dzin 'a mtha' yas gsung 'dzin mtha' yas blo gros 'chang // sor mo'i 'phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// mtha' yas 'od 'chang mtha' yas ldem ngag ston// sor
204a7(mdo sde): mo'i 'breng thogs khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// mtha' yas sgyu 'chang mtha' yas bdud rnams 'dul// nyon mongs bye ba rnam par smin byed 'chang // sor 'phreng thogs pa khyod
204a8(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshalo// mtha' yas yongasu mya ngan 'da' byed cing / mtha' yas skye stong 'jig rten rje su 'jug/ dpa' bo mchog 'chang khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// de nas bcom
204b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs na/ de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
204b2(mdo sde): 'das khyod yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas te bzhugs pa ji lta bu lags/ nga ni thar pa'i sa la gnaso// zhes bka' stsal pa/ tshig de la dad par 'gyir mi rung na// 'di la de'i gtan tshigs
204b3(mdo sde): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig du deng la 'di nas byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi
204b4(mdo sde): zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham sa 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bskyed du ma da pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
204b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros bskyed du med pa'i ston 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
204b6(mdo sde): de la bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs bzhin mi skye bo'i mtha' la gnaso zhes gsungs na/ ji lta bu lags
204b7(mdo sde): zhes zhus shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng bas leg so lag so zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis dang pa'i rgyal po ltar dga'
204b8(mdo sde): ba bskyed du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon 'byung gnas so'i dbang phyug rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der
205a1(mdo sde): // dong ste nye bar phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis 'dir ma chis pa
205a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas bkye ste 'dir mchi so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yongs mya ngan las ma 'dra/ 
205a3(mdo sde): par de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du ma skyes pa'i mtha' thar pa la ji ltar gnas shes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nges 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i phreng ba la
205a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang yin pa nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid sngon gyis
205a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyed deng la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag cag 'di ltar bkye'o zhes smos shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor
205a6(mdo sde): mo'i 'brang ba gnyis langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas dge'o zhes smras te/ ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du slar 'ongaso// bcom ldan 'das ga
205a7(mdo sde): la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
205a8(mdo sde): sku ni mtha' yas so// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bdag cag gis mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung
205b1(mdo sde): gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ston to zhes tshig brjod nas bdag cag slar bkye na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
205b2(mdo sde): 'di na bzhugs bzhin du ji ltar ma skyes pa'i mtha' la gnas pa bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal yang ji ltar blo gros bskyang du med pa yon gyi 'byung gnas sa'i dbang
205b3(mdo sde): phyag rgyal por gyur cing / dga' ba bskyad du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji ltar gnas pa 'di na 'dug bzhin du de na ji ltar gnas 'di na 'dug la ma skyes pa'i mtha' la ji ltar
205b4(mdo sde): gnas shes ma zer cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni maH'ayas so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' yas par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshungs pa med pa'o// 
205b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshungs pa med par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dpag tu med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med par rgyu ba'o// sor mo'i
205b6(mdo sde): 'phreng ba ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis sku ma skyes par gyur pa de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / sangs rgya kyi ston par 'gyuraro// de nas sor mo'i 'breng bas
205b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du legs par bshad gsol// bcom
205b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya stong phrag bcur pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pas sems can yang dag par bsdus te/ sems can byang chub
206a1(mdo sde): / kyi sems ma skyes sems can bye ba mang po byang chub la bkod ngo do// dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa dang de'i dge ba'i
206a2(mdo sde): rtsa bas ma skyes pa'i bskur gyur to// sor mo'i 'phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba'i skur gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
206a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma byung ba'i glog gi 'brang ba zhes
206a4(mdo sde): bya ba de na rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin ga/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzheso// sor mo'i 'phreng
206a5(mdo sde): nga khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig du ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
206a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs par deng la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ yang dag pa'i
206a7(mdo sde): mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng bas leg so zhes gsol nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
206a8(mdo sde): kyis rkang pas ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
206b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin du zhus pa dang / snga ma bzhin du 'dir lhags nas sor mo'i phreng ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 
206b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar nam byung ba'i mtha' la gnas pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
206b3(mdo sde): sor mo'i 'phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya stong mang por pha rol tu phyin pa bcus/ sems can yang dag par bsdus te/ sngon ma byung ba'i bde ba la rab tu bkod pas nga'i lus bskal
206b4(mdo sde): pa bye ba mang por tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu byin pa las ma byung lus su gyur to// sor mo'i 'phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'dus ma bgyis kyi
206b5(mdo sde): mtha' la gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang gA'i klung gsum bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
206b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yid 'phrog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros mi zad pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
206b7(mdo sde): gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs
206b8(mdo sde): log su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba na rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
207a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
207a2(mdo sde): pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
207a3(mdo sde): khams zab mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de ni/ zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
207a4(mdo sde): gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'angs shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su
207a5(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma drug snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham sa 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rlung zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
207a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi 'tsho ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar
207a7(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig pa snga ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bdun snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
207a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
207b1(mdo sde): gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu
207b2(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
207b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar
207b4(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu gang gA 'i klung gi bye ma dgu snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
207b5(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba mchog ces bya ba da ltar
207b6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas
207b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma shar ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs
207b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs bdal ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das
208a1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdun// bam po lnga pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang gA'i
208a2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bro dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bro la rog
208a3(mdo sde): dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar
208a4(mdo sde): phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'ji ga rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
208a5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsa lag 'tsho ba'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gan sa kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan
208a6(mdo sde): radas shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma skad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
208a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'phreng bas bsgos pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dri gcod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
208a8(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i
208b1(mdo sde): klung gzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ta ma la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
208b2(mdo sde): rgyas ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
208b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ngan/ de bzhin ga
208b4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ga zhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das
208b5(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang gA'i klung drag gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
208b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams a ga ru dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a ga ru'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 
208b7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung bdun gyi
208b8(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye mas bsgoms pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
209a1(mdo sde): // rgyas phye ma'i spos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ 
209a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin
209a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skor ma'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan
209a4(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
209a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtshos byin pa zhes bya ba
209a6(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs
209a7(mdo sde): log su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams klu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
209a8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
209b1(mdo sde): ba dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan chen zhes bya ba de na/ de
209b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom
209b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
209b4(mdo sde): gyi khams sprir chen po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
209b5(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su
209b6(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
209b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog sbyin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar ga
209b8(mdo sde): da dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba
210a1(mdo sde): // de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sring po zhes bya ba nga ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de
210a2(mdo sde): la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 
210a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'gro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar
210a4(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhi na gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs
210a5(mdo sde): log su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jagarten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i dzin ces bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
210a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu 'dzin 'chang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa
210a7(mdo sde): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' ldan pa zhes bya ba
210a8(mdo sde): de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
210b1(mdo sde): de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na
210b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul ba zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
210b3(mdo sde): gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log sa gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed
210b4(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gsheg sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
210b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhug sa te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ 
210b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de
210b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bam
210b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ang nas nub phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
211a1(mdo sde): // rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snyar pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing ga
211a2(mdo sde): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi
211a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'dzi garten gyi khams gang gA'i 'brang ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
211a4(mdo sde): gang gis byin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs de 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ ba com ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sa
211a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba de na/ de
211a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu blo gros zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom
211a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs log su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 
211a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs/ 
211b1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang gA'i klung / 
211b2(mdo sde): lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
211b3(mdo sde): me tog mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
211b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di ras nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs
211b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom
211b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs log su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 
211b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mig gi bdag po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhug
211b8(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logs gang+gA'i klung
212a1(mdo sde): // brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
212a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ke'i la sa'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris
212a3(mdo sde): shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnga sgra zhes bya ba de na/ de
212a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rnga dbyangs shes bya ba da ltar bzhug sa te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
212a5(mdo sde): de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dri sa shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
212a6(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sdug pa'i mchog ces bya ba
212a7(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang
212a8(mdo sde): gi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
212b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
212b2(mdo sde): pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
212b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mdzes sdug ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
212b4(mdo sde): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang
212b5(mdo sde): gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
212b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
212b7(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
212b8(mdo sde): spyad pa ying 'phrog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyad pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnyis kyis
213a1(mdo sde): / de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byung gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i
213a2(mdo sde): klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sems can dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba de ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
213a3(mdo sde): nga'i sangs rgyas sems can gyi mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris
213a4(mdo sde): shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyog sa mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma swA da kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
213a5(mdo sde): gyi khams glog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi bla ma zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho
213a6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams
213a7(mdo sde): logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
213a8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar
213b1(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
213b2(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
213b3(mdo sde): pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma srid kyi 'jig
213b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtan pa'i
213b5(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyi sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shA kye thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi
213b6(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i ro zhes bya ba de na/ 
213b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chu'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom
213b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
214a1(mdo sde): / 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog can ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
214a2(mdo sde): 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ni re bu'i 'od ces bya ba ngan
214a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bsrel ba zhes bya ba la dris shog pa gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su
214a4(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
214a5(mdo sde): rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed
214a6(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig/ pa'ang gong ma bzhin
214a7(mdo sde): du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'iri klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rter gyi khams gser mdog
214a8(mdo sde): ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gsal zhes bya ba dris shig/ pa'ang lnga ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
214b1(mdo sde): log su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i chu ba
214b2(mdo sde): gser mchog ces bya ba la'ang dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi
214b3(mdo sde): gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa can gyi 'od ces bya ba la dros shig
214b4(mdo sde): pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
214b5(mdo sde): nas 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med nga'i chu zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// 
214b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ byung shar gyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi'ajig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshul
214b7(mdo sde): khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang
214b8(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'i neb che'i gling zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
215a1(mdo sde): // gshegs pa rin cher byung zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shA
215a2(mdo sde): lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung gnas shes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gsheg
215a3(mdo sde): pa rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
215a4(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi blo gros tog ces bya ba'i
215a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye
215a6(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros grub pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang ga
215a7(mdo sde): ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
215a8(mdo sde): khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i bai DUr+ya zhes bya ba la dris shig/ nga'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 
215b1(mdo sde): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skyes bu klu la dga' ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs
215b2(mdo sde): pa skyes bu klu'i snying po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
215b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ro zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spros brtsegs pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// 
215b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
215b5(mdo sde): spos ldan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs
215b6(mdo sde): mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams drang po'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
215b7(mdo sde): drang po'i dpal zhes bya ba la dris shog pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi
215b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin thang med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin thang med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma
216a1(mdo sde): // bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rte
216a2(mdo sde): gyi khams mtha' yas gtsug pud can zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po la dris shig
216a3(mdo sde): ba'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
216a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la
216a5(mdo sde): dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams lo gsu gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
216a6(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i mig ces bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i
216a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed
216a8(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me'i gzi brjid ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma
216b1(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
216b2(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mun pa sel ldan zhes bya ba
216b3(mdo sde): la dris shig/ pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
216b4(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byin pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs nga'i sangs rgyas byin pa'i
216b5(mdo sde): snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nu ba kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung drug gi bye
216b6(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi skye ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
216b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mi skye ba'i dbang phyug la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bdun
216b8(mdo sde): gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
217a1(mdo sde): // pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che'i rnam par gnon pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su
217a2(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snod ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
217a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi snod rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang gA'i klung
217a4(mdo sde): dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i dbyangs sha sa bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
217a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba la dris shog pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ang nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung
217a6(mdo sde): bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
217a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar
217a8(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ snying gi phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig
217b1(mdo sde): rten mthong ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba che
217b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rgyal po'o 'od 'phro ba rnam par sprul pa'i bkod pa go cha chen po bgos pa/ sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po thams cad la 'od byed snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba da ltar
217b3(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi
217b4(mdo sde): phyogs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
217b5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba da ltar ba zhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
217b6(mdo sde): de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs legs gang gA'i klung gsum gyi
217b7(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chus me tog kha 'bye ba zhes bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
217b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kha 'bye ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gan
218a1(mdo sde): // pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyog su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes
218a2(mdo sde): bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan thams cad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin
218a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
218a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la mthing ka zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
218a5(mdo sde): po che'i ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshazhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'angs shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang ngas
218a6(mdo sde): shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba de
218a7(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la
218a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs log su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
218b1(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu da dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ku mu ta'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
218b2(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs logasu gang
218b3(mdo sde): gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
218b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang
218b5(mdo sde): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ras/ steng gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa 8/ 'jig rten gyi khams ko kang saM ka zhes
218b6(mdo sde): bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkra shis thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ 
218b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung bcu'i be ra
218b8(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsod nams kyi stegs cen zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
219a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bsod rams kyi stegs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar ba
219a2(mdo sde): pa'ang dras shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma skad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sang+ge'i tshul zhes bya ba da na/ de
219a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs gang+gA
219a4(mdo sde): klang gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stag gi ngag ces bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
219a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stag sgra sgrogs shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i gleng gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
219a6(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shing sa ha ka ra zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ha ka ra'i me tog rlung zhes bya ba
219a7(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bya ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ldan zhes bya ba de na/ 
219a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las/ rgyal bar 'dul ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu
219b1(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mi chags pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
219b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa chen po rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma
219b3(mdo sde): sed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mkha' 'bigs 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
219b4(mdo sde): rgyas mkha' 'bigs rtse mo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na
219b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ltang mo che ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas ri mo thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / 
219b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logasu gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de na
219b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs
219b8(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
220a1(mdo sde): // pa'i sangs rgyas sa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma skad kyi 'jig rten gyi 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
220a2(mdo sde): gyi khams rtag tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas the tsom dang / yid gnyis thams cad gcod
220a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
220a4(mdo sde): na yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das par bzhugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig gi dpes brgyan pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon
220a5(mdo sde): rur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod deng la/ ba com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de la dris sha ga/ khyed kyi the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad
220a6(mdo sde): gcod par 'gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / ser
220a7(mdo sde): mo'i 'phreng bas/ bcom ldan 'das la legaso legaso zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis
220a8(mdo sde): ngang po'i rgyal po ltar dong ste/ rtag tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom dang yid gnyis thaMd gcod pa zhes
220b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i zhangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
220b2(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir mchis so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu'i zhabs kyi drung du'ang phyir te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mdzad kyi
220b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ mya ngan las 'das bzhin du thar pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa de dag thams cad la zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'di skad ces
220b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa deng dang gcig gis de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa de la zhus shig ces gsung nas/ bcom ldan
220b5(mdo sde): la 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rigs kyi bu khyad gnyis deng la/ the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod po'i rnam pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris
220b6(mdo sde): shig ces bdag cag 'dir bkye ste mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs shing mya ngan las ma 'das par/ ji ltar thar pa'i
220b7(mdo sde): mtha' la gnas shes zhus pa dang / de gnyis kyi tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de sa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu myur du slar log shig/ de bzhi
220b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa des the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te/ tha dad pa ma yin no// de ltar shAkya thub pa ni tshad meng zhes
221a1(mdo sde): // gsungs nas slar bkye'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la lags so leg so zhes gsol te/ sor mo'i 'brang ba dang lhan cig tu de bzhin
221a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// 
221a3(mdo sde): kye la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshang med grangs med par 'dzin pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te/ shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa des khyed kyi the tsom thams cad
221a4(mdo sde): gcod par 'gyur gyis khyed deng shog ces de dag gis kyang bdag cag bkye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa
221a5(mdo sde): de gsung ngam/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de gcig gsung ba bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsung ste/ tha mar bdag cag gis zhus na/ de bzhin ga
221a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin te/ gcig go zhes gsung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi
221a7(mdo sde): khams de dag ci 'dra/ de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag cag gis phyin pa thams cad ni gram pa dang / gyo mo tha
221a8(mdo sde): cang ma mchis pa/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam pa/ ka tsa lin da ka bzhin reg na bde ba/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ltar sdigs ma lnga dang bral ba/ nyan thos dang
221b1(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / bud med ma mchis pa thag pa dam pa gcig ste/ theg pa gzhan la mi 'jug/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
221b2(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang kha don legs par byed dam/ 'dri 'am/ nyan kyang rung ste/ snying ngam/ brjod dam/ gzhan gyi phyir 'phya 'am/ bdag gis brjod na/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad
221b3(mdo sde): mang par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la gnod par mi byed do// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dri za la sog
221b4(mdo sde): bas kyang mi tshugs so// thos nas la la bsrung bar 'gyur/ nges 'gro ba bzhi bcad pa yin no// byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi rgyu
221b5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro// zhes gsung ngo // sor mo'i 'phreng ba gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid ngo mtshar ba ni gzungs mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo sde chen po las sangs
221b6(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu gcig ste/ nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin// zhes rgya cher bshad do// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsngags pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
221b7(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang tshad med pa ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yang mtha' yas grangs med/ de lta bu'i yon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la
221b8(mdo sde): mi rtag pa dang nad lta ga la 'byung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa dang / mtha' yas pa rtse ba dang bcas// rgyu dang rkyen du bcas pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad khyed la rgya cher
222a1(mdo sde): bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams na skye bo rnams mi dge bas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal po mi bzhed ngo // mi dge ba dag pa la bkod
222a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir lus yang dang yang btang bas na/ nga'i lus ma skyes pa'i skur gyur to// nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba grangs mang pa mang por dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir/ nga'i lus gang
222a3(mdo sde): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus ra re yang bcang btubs bcom nas/ byin pas nga yi lus mi shigs pa 'dus ma byas kyi lus mtshungs pa med par gyur to// bskal pa bye ba
222a4(mdo sde): mang por dpa' bo ltar 'dug ste/ gnas mang por gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed kyi lus mang po btang ste/ lus re re yang bskal pa bye ba mang por dpa' bo ltar 'dug cing dka' ba spyang
222a5(mdo sde): pas nga'i lus rga ba med pa'i skur gyur to// bskal pa bye ba mang por grangs med par nga nad kyi bskal pa bar mar skyes te nga'i lus re re yang sman dam par gyur nas
222a6(mdo sde): gang bA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams la phan bta gas pas na/ nga yi lus nad med pa'i skur gyur to// nga tshe rabs mang por gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal
222a7(mdo sde): pa bye ba mang por grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po ltogs pa'i nad zhi bar byas te/ theg pa gcig po'i khu ba blud pas na/ nga'i lus mi 'chi ba'i skar gyur to// ngas bskal pa bye
222a8(mdo sde): mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po nyon mongs pa bye ba mang po'i dri ma bsal nas/ shin tu dka' ba bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pas na/ nga'i
