356b1(mdo sde): smras so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba gang yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun
356b2(mdo sde): pa 'od srung chen po/ bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// zhi gnas de la chags pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
356b3(mdo sde): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang lte bar song ba rnams la bstsal bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la snying por 'du shes pa
356b4(mdo sde): dang / mtshan ma rnams la bstsal par 'du shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / smon lam la ba stsal bar 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la
356b5(mdo sde): snying por 'du shes pa dang / 'khar ba la bstsal bar 'dug sa pa 'di dag ni btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
356b6(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po lta bar song ba bstsal nas/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ lta bar song ba nyid stong pa nyid // mtshan ma bstsal nas/ mtshan ma med pa
356b7(mdo sde): bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o// smon lam bstsal nas/ smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid ston
356b8(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// 'khor ba bstsal nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ 'khor bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o// btsun pa 'od srung chen po
357a1(mdo sde): // mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'du shes dang / rlom sems dang / mtshan ma la dmigs pa thams cad la mi spyod pa te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni skye ba dang / 
357a2(mdo sde): 'jig pa dang / zad pa las ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med pa zag
357a3(mdo sde): pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/ dge slong nga
357a4(mdo sde): dag gis smras pa/ gang thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang med paso// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ brtul ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ ji ltar
357a5(mdo sde): gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ chung zad kyang khrid pa yang me de// mkhrid pa yang med do// ji ltar gnas pa bzhi nadu shes pa dang / bskyed pa yang med/ bkag pa yang mang
357a6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul to// dge slong de dag gis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu stong nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
357a7(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ gzhan yang bdud sdug can la 'di skad ces smras// sdig can ji ltar na dge sbyong sbyin gnas yin// bdud kyis
357a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nas dge slong len pa yang med de/ nod pa yang me la/ dad cing dang bathams cad las yongs su spyod pa na'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dge slong
357b1(mdo sde): gang ma byin pa de la sgyu ma'i blo dang / gang len pa de la mig yor gyi blo dang / nye bar len pa'i sems dang / nye bar len pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang / yongasu mi spyod pa'i dge slong nga
357b2(mdo sde): lta bu ni sbyin gnas yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa gang yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ting
357b3(mdo sde): 'dzin gang la rten nas/ shin tu zad pa'i phyir/ zad pa yang zad par mi byed/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ ma skyes pa yang mi skyed/ myong ba med pa yang myong bar mi byed de/ chos thams
357b4(mdo sde): cad kyang rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes la/ shes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug cing / mnyam par yang mthong la/ chung zad kyang mthong ba
357b5(mdo sde): yang med/ mi mthong ba yang med pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis ting 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa'o// mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na/ dag
357b6(mdo sde): slong sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ nam dge slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid du
357b7(mdo sde): shes la/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa yang med cing // sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol ba shes la/ 'ching bar yang mi byed/ grol bar yang mi byed/ sem
357b8(mdo sde): gzugs med pas/ chos thams cad gzugs med par shes/ sems gnas pa med pas/ chos thams cad gnas pa med par mthong / sems 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad
358a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med par shes kyang / sems kyis sems shes pa yang med la/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yang
358a2(mdo sde): shes shing / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par dbang thob pa ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa yin te/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dge slong de lta bu
358a3(mdo sde): ni sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa yin no// gang pos smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong yongasu dag par chos ston pa yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po/ nam dge slong gis
358a4(mdo sde): gzhan las chos thams cad shes kyang / gzhan dang ga/ ni ma yin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa yang med/ chos thams cad kyang sgro btags par yang ston yi ge dang skad dang
358a5(mdo sde): dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam thams cad kyang brag cha lta bu ra shes/ chos nyan pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skye sa bu ltar mthong // gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig lus kyi rnam par
358a6(mdo sde): rig byed kyang chu zla dang 'dra bar mthong / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su rtog pa las byung bar shes/ chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i phyir ram/ dor ba'i phyir ram/ shin tu bzla ba'i phyir
358a7(mdo sde): ram thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos mi ston// so so yang dag par rig pa ban po rnams la yang dbang thob cing legaso zhes bya ba la yang re ba med la/ zang zing med par chos ston cing
358a8(mdo sde): rang gi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yong su dag par shes te/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongasu dag par shes nas/ 
358b1(mdo sde): nas/ phung po'i bdud la dben par mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud la ma skyes pa dang / mi skye bar gnas pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud la
358b2(mdo sde): g.yo ba dang / rlom sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te// dge slong de lta bu ni yongasu dag par chos ston pa yin// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong 'dul ba
358b3(mdo sde): 'dzin dri bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye ba 'khor/ dge slong gis nam chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/ nyes pa rnams kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i mthar shes
358b4(mdo sde): te/ nyes pa byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa yang sel cing / da ma por mi byed de// de dag la gang gis mtshams me da pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon na/ cho ga dang tshul khrims la
358b5(mdo sde): log par zhugs pa phran tshegs lta bus kyang ci dgo sa pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa yang nye ba rabasgrag/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang mkhas/ bla bur gyis nyon
358b6(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams la yang kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa dang 'byung bar 'du shes/ nyon mongs par nang du yi nga mi ston/ phyi rol tu yang ma yin gnyi ga med par yang
358b7(mdo sde): ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid/ nyon mongs pa med par shes shing / nyon mongs pa yang mi sel/ nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi bsgrub/ nyon mongs pa thad kyang sprin dang / 
358b8(mdo sde): char sprin 'dra bar shes te/ ye shes dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis btor nas/ phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba yang med gnas pa yang med pa dang / nyin mongs pa rnams ni chu zla deng 'dras/ 
359a1(mdo sde): / yongs su rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis/ bzhin nye bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/ shes rab kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang / 
359a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom snyun dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang // gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'dra ste/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam
359a3(mdo sde): ni glags tshol ba ste/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phel ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas/ su nyon
359a4(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/ sems can nyo na mongs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang / sems can med par mngon sum du
359a5(mdo sde): gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thad kyis/ rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas/ bdud sdig can gyis
359a6(mdo sde): kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab pa bstan pas sems rangs par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bdud sdig
359a7(mdo sde): can de la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshang zin gyis/ khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig/ sdig
359a8(mdo sde): car byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i bu nyi shu po 'di
359b1(mdo sde): dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi las yang dag phul yin no// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa/ rnam par grol ba 'dod cing / 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la snyan pa
359b2(mdo sde): dang / sten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi laso// stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing / sems can yal bar 'dor ba yang bdud kyi laso// 'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing // 'dus
359b3(mdo sde): byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu skyo ba yang bdud kyi laso// bsam gtan skyed cing / bsam gtan las rnam par ldeg pa tshol ba yang bdud kyi laso// chos ston kyang chos nyan pa
359b4(mdo sde): rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa yang bdud kyi laso// yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sbyin gnas tshol zhing / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba yang bdud kyi laso// nyan
359b5(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing // theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa yang bdud kyi laso// zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang bdud kyi
359b6(mdo sde): la so// byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang // pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongasu mi tshol ba yang bdud k+Shi laso// rab tu brtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / sems can gyi brtseni ba
359b7(mdo sde): rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba yang bdud kyi laso// dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon tu mi byed pa yang bdud kyi laso// lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas
359b8(mdo sde): kyang sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa yang bdud kyi laso// nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing / 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs
360a1(mdo sde): // pa rnams la sdong pa'ang bdud kyi laso// shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad cing // snying rje chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi laso// thabs dang mi ldan par dge bar
360a2(mdo sde): spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod mi tshol gyi// 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pada'ang bdud kyi la so// mang du thos kyang gcan
360a3(mdo sde): gyis shes dogs ste/ chos la slob dpon dpe mkhrud byed pa'ang bdud kyi laso// 'jig rten pa 'di dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi laso// byang
360a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa skal pa mnyam pa rnams la mi sten/ mi snyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
360a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ skal pa mi mnyam pa la dga' ba'ang bdud kyi laso// gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ 
360a6(mdo sde): rgyal po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gis longs spyod dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi ster/ 
360a7(mdo sde): mi snyen bsnyen bkur mo byed pa 'di dag ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la
360a8(mdo sde): sdig can khyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni leg so zhes/ leg so zhes bya ba byino// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi
360b1(mdo sde): 'di rnams thos shing thos nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
360b2(mdo sde): po dang / 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyam pa dang / byang
360b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang / tshe rangs tshe
360b4(mdo sde): rab su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang / 
360b5(mdo sde): thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas/ sems can snga sa tsang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yo ngasu 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu med pa dang / phangs pa'i
360b6(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa te/ byang chub yong su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i bu mtsham
360b7(mdo sde): bzangs kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so// sdig car khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis leg so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnye // bdud
360b8(mdo sde): kyis smras pa lha'i bu 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig lags par rnyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi gang 'byung po babs pas bstan pa de ni/ mi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin
361a1(mdo sde): // gyi dado ni 'byung po nga'i 'gyur bar blta'o// lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi/ 'di kho ba'i skyes bu'i rtsal du ni mi balnga'o// lnga'i
361a2(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sang+ge'i khri la 'dug te/ sangs rgyas kyi spongs pa dang ldan zhing / chos ston pas dga' ba
361a3(mdo sde): gyur tam/ bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na/ kho bo ni bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par sheso// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ 'jam dpal
361a4(mdo sde): gzhonur gyur pa la/ bzod pa gsol cig dang / de nas gtong bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdud kyis lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad
361a5(mdo sde): ces smos// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhu gas pa rnams la bzod par gsol mi dgos so// de ci'i
361a6(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'khrug pa med/ khro ba med pa'i phyiraro// gang dag 'khrugs cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub sems
361a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ci 'dra/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis ste/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ 
361a8(mdo sde): btsas ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dge khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la me slubs// g.yo med pa'i bzod
361b1(mdo sde): pa dang / dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa med pas/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar song ba dang bral bas/ stong
361b2(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang / chos nyid la rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo ri rjesu 'jug pas 'thun pa'i
361b3(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjesu srung bas ngo byed pa yang med la mi 'thun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang
361b4(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis / 
361b5(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod gal te bkrol na/ dga' bar 'gyur ram/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo dga' ste/ mchog tu dga'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams
361b6(mdo sde): bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig dang / rang gi gnas 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
361b7(mdo sde): pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso// sdug can khyod su zhig gis bcings/ gang las dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni sus bcings mi sheso// 'jam
361b8(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can khyod ji ltar bcings pa med pa la bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes
362a1(mdo sde): // sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tsher ba med pa dang / 'du
362a2(mdo sde): shes me pa dang / 'du byed rnams ming pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa la tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'dugs// sdug can kyang dgrol
362a3(mdo sde): na gang nas dgral// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag ni gang las kyang mi dgrol lo// smras pa/ sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du
362a4(mdo sde): yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par/ gang las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de// de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal
362a5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas/ byir gyis brlabs de bsdus pa dang // sdig can de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bad ga gis she so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bdud sdig
362a6(mdo sde): can la 'ad skad smraso// sdug can khyod kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa leg so leg so// bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po 'di ni kho ba'i yul ma yin gyi// 'di ni 'a
362a7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o// de nas lha'i bu mtsham bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du
362a8(mdo sde): btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam su btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te seMn rnams
362b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyiro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gal te sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na/ sman pas kyang bya bar mi
362b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyuraro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang byung
362b3(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas 'byung // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba byung na/ sangs rgyas 'byung // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs
362b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i phyiraro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub pa rnyes nas/ chos bskyed pa de gang chos bkag pa gang / 'jam
362b5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ chos gang yang bskye dpa yang med/ bkag pa yang mdo// de ci'i phyir zhe malda
362b6(mdo sde): bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyiraro// lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i
362b7(mdo sde): tshig bla dgas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang dmigs pa'i
362b8(mdo sde): lta bas chos gang la yang kun tu mo spyod pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// gang nang dang phyi'i chos
363a1(mdo sde): / rnams la chags pa mang ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nyon mongs pa thams
363a2(mdo sde): cad kyang 'dor la/ sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam
363a3(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing / sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la lhag pa'i bsams pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'ang
363a4(mdo sde): ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid shes
363a5(mdo sde): nas sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro ba dang tha ba spang ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub
363a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i chos de ni/ 'di lta ste/ bla na
363a7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de nyid shin tu yang dag par rje su ma mthong la/ sems cad thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir// brtson 'grus gces pa yang mi 'ang
363a8(mdo sde): ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs
363b1(mdo sde): bar shes kyang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs
363b2(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rnam par spyod na
363b3(mdo sde): ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yino// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
363b4(mdo sde): nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya nga na las 'das par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems snying rje la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
363b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smai na pa med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jam
363b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa// nam chos thams cad la dga' ba yang mi skyed la/ mi dga' ba yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la ga
363b7(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa'
363b8(mdo sde): yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur thung ba med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
364a1(mdo sde): // dpa' chen po yom 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o// lnga'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
364a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems can gyis mchog yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang / gzhi med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na
364a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' go ca chen po bgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam par thos nas/ mi dngang
364a4(mdo sde): mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / go ca chen po mi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
364a5(mdo sde): snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du srid ba ma yin la/ srid pa'i bag la nyal gyi nye bar bsnyen pa yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus sbas pa/ ji ltar na
364a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed
364a7(mdo sde): pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing / tshig ji skad
364a8(mdo sde): smras pa bzhin byed pa no'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang 'thun pa'i phyir/ 
364b1(mdo sde): sems can thams kyi bsgo ba la mi 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad dang 'thun par gnas pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa
364b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nang yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol du rgyu ba la yang rgya ba na'o// lnga
364b3(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/ chags pa thams cad la zhen pa
364b4(mdo sde): yang med na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba btan pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi bcod pa na'o// lha'i bas
364b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gson pa na'o// lha'i bus
364b6(mdo sde): smos pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sem
364b7(mdo sde): dpe' 'dod pa nyung ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa
364b8(mdo sde): ma'o// lha'i bus smras pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chog shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes pas/ chos gang yang mi len pa ma
365a1(mdo sde): // lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la yang gnas la 'jig rten pa'i rgyu ba
365a2(mdo sde): kyang sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam nyon mongs pa tha~Md kyis kyang
365a3(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson par yang snang ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang dga'
365a4(mdo sde): rang dbang can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam tha ga pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/ ye shes kyi dbang byed kyi nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma
365a5(mdo sde): yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing ga
365a6(mdo sde): la yang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam dmigs pa tha
365a7(mdo sde): las 'byung ba rab tu shes kyang / chos thams cad 'phros par yang mi byed/ mi 'phros par yang mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa snying po
365a8(mdo sde): byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam gzhan dang 'brel pa'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la/ rang gi sems kyi sku
365b1(mdo sde): pa la yang mi lta zhing // bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas bslab pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa
365b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la mtshungs
365b3(mdo sde): pa rab tu 'byed cing / sgra skad brag cha dang mtshungs par shes nas/ mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 
365b4(mdo sde): de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu ra ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal
365b5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyi na gyis yongasu zin par gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phu na sum tshogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dmigs pa med par
365b6(mdo sde): spyod pa dag gis/ kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ de dag ci ma mos par 'gyur/ bsam pa ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
365b7(mdo sde): de dag ni zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsams pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam
365b8(mdo sde): dpal rgyam smras pa chu'i bun mi dag spang 'jig tshogs la lta ba ba nyid kyis/ bgad pa gcig du'i lam du ma / gnyisu radapas 'jigs tshogs pa 'tsha
366a1(mdo sde): / nyid gang yin pa de bskrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo ba nyid du mnyam par shes shing / ma rig pa dang srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba yang tshol la ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang
366a2(mdo sde): sred pa las 'byung ba la sor rtog pa ni/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sreng pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/ de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i
366a3(mdo sde): rgyal med pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' rang bzhin
366a4(mdo sde): yang 'dod chagasu shes pa dang / zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing // zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang / 
366a5(mdo sde): gti mug gi mthal gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / gti mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i ra bzhin yang gti mug du 'du shes pa ni ste/ de ltar na dge slong
366a6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongasu shes par mi byed/ kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/ 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed
366a7(mdo sde): lam sgom par yang mi byang la/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rjesu rtogs ste/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba
366a8(mdo sde): gang la yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes po gang yin pa de la/ 'gog pa yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la/ lam gang yang med pa de ltar dag
366b1(mdo sde): slong tshul bzhin la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/ 'gag par yang mi byed/ gnas par yang mi byed// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de
366b2(mdo sde): 'dres ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden par bsgom ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yi no// de nas bdud sdig
366b3(mdo sde): can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ gdong mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas bsnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smraso// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de ni// bdud
366b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi skabs med do// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dge bdud kyi las thams ca da bkag par 'gyu ro// zhes de skad smras nas/ bdud sdig can
366b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bangade ste/ yid la bcags pa zhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyuraro// de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'di
366b6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa lta na/ de nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di bos nas spong ba'i dag
366b7(mdo sde): slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba medado// bsnyen par rdzogs pa med// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim pa de dag gis ston pa
366b8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ma yin// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag
367a1(mdo sde): / mi dngangal dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces
367a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// lha'i bu de de bzhi no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog
367a3(mdo sde): tu zab pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang par mi 'gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa 'dis byang chub
367a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa ngag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / bzod pa 'dis nya na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'brung
367a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyi ro// lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'angs chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 2de ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
367a6(mdo sde): stsal pa lha'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 
367a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu 'ong mang po dang thams cad da ldan pa'i 'kho rang dang / lnga dang / mi dang ldan
367a8(mdo sde): yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba za/ 
367b1(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+ha dang / dzi na mai tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gas
367b2(mdo sde): tshad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa
367b3(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi
367b4(mdo sde): kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i r-i la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi da ge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / yang thabs gcig tu
367b5(mdo sde): zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phye 'phrad kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dge 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor cing / 'dun gyis bltas
367b6(mdo sde): nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'chag cing // dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung ste/ gnas brtan shA
367b7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gnas rtan shA ri'i bu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas/ bsam
367b8(mdo sde): gtan byed par mthong ngo // mthong nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod bsam gtan byed dam smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhi ma / 
368a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed
368a2(mdo sde): ngam ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'das pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te nga ltar byung ba la gnas/ te bsam gta
368a3(mdo sde): byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed
368a4(mdo sde): ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod mig la gnas/ bsam gta na byed dam/ 'on te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang // yid la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu
368a5(mdo sde): khyod gzugs la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri
368a6(mdo sde): bu khyod pa 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa
368a7(mdo sde): ri'i bu khyod nang la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ 'on te phyi nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed// ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyad
368a8(mdo sde): lus la gnas te/ bsam ga byed dam/ 'on te sems la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba dang
368b1(mdo sde): brjed pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te/ de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa 'am/ 
368b2(mdo sde): 'di la ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa 'am brjed pa med pa'i chos de dag dmigs sam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas
368b3(mdo sde): pa 'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i// chos de dag yang dag par rjesu ma mthong zhing mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos
368b4(mdo sde): rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag rten cing gnaso// 'jam dpal gyi sa smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
368b5(mdo sde): thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i cho su gsungs pa gang yin na btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la rten cing gnas/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la dge slong na 'das pa
368b6(mdo sde): brten cing gan so// ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gan so// da ltar byung ba la brten cing gnaso// de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas par khong du chud par bya ste/ 'jam dpal
368b7(mdo sde): chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben par gsungs pa yin te/ bdag chos de dag la rten cing gnaso// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
368b8(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir 'di skad ces 'das pa la brten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing rab tu dben pa la gnas pa na/ de bzhin du sbyar te sems
369a1(mdo sde): kyis bar la gnas shing // rab tu dben pa la gnas zhes smra/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de
369a2(mdo sde): yang yod pa ma yin/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dag ni yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bu de 'di skad ces 'das pa la
369a3(mdo sde): chen cang gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ nga ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas shes spras// yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa mdo// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i
369a4(mdo sde): mazhin cing dang / ma 'das pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i de ba shin nga gang yin pa don ci yid ma yin gang gi sa kyang ma yin// gang gi yang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas
369a5(mdo sde): mi gnas pa de'i gnas dmigs su mdo// yang bcu na pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas nas
369a6(mdo sde): smras pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni nyams
369a7(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'o// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmig su med/ gang ma 'ongs
369a8(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin nyid nga yang dmig su med// gang da ltar byung ba'i de nyid de yang dmig su med pa nas// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de yang dmig su mdo// 'on kyang
369b1(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang bstan pa 'am/ rab tu bshad par nus pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de
369b2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs
369b3(mdo sde): te/ chos ston/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos kyang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs ste chos ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma
369b4(mdo sde): yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston// chos thams cad kyang yo da ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin te
369b5(mdo sde): dmigs su medo// de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa 'am/ mi dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba med// de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa 'am/ 
369b6(mdo sde): mi brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa yang dag par chad pa/ btags pa med pa/ gdags
369b7(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin la/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA
369b8(mdo sde): ri'i bu gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du
370a1(mdo sde): // 'gyu ro// gang 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
370a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur// 
370a3(mdo sde): gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi mthong zhing / de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di'i snod du 'gyu ro// gang bdag dang / bdag med par yang spyod
370a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang len pa dang / 'dor bar yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur te/ don bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur/ 
370a5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa
370a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyu ra zhes 'di skad 'dri/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur
370a7(mdo sde): ba nyung 'di ni yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung // 'jam dpal dgra bcom pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyang sa phyogs 'di la sgying lug par 'gyur na/ byis
370a8(mdo sde): pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa rnams la ni sa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang med
370b1(mdo sde): na sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu phye ba'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni dmigasu med pas rab tu phye'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod
370b2(mdo sde): pa dang mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa yang dag par chad pa ste/ btags pa med pa'o// 
370b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dag dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// 'jug pa med pa/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ dgra bcom pa dag ni 'dus
370b4(mdo sde): ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na// ci zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yino// byis pa so so'i sku
370b5(mdo sde): bo rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par rtog go// ming dang ga zugs de yang rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/ de
370b6(mdo sde): phyir dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yino// byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ byis pa'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams
370b7(mdo sde): kyang mi dmig so// nam mi dmigs pa de ni mi rtog/ kun tu mi spyod do// de spyod pa med/ spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste/ yod nga zhes khas mi len/ mdo zhes bya bas khas mi len/ 
370b8(mdo sde): yod kyang yod la med kyang mdo zhes khas len yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to// na ma khas mi len pa de na dmigs pa med do//  dmigs
371a1(mdo sde): // pa thams cad dang bral sems med cing sems dang bral ste/ gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis dge slong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan
371a2(mdo sde): pa 'di bshad pa ma 'khor de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan las langs nas/ 'di skad ces 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o// 'jam dpal gno nur gyur pa mi mnyan to// rnam dpal
371a3(mdo sde): gzhonar gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur bzhin du/ kun nas
371a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas// chos ma yin pa smra'o zhes brjod nas/ de dag yang 'de snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
371a5(mdo sde): kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod par spyad snyam nas dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
371a6(mdo sde): ces smra so// 'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyi chos kun shes par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin no// 
371a7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag stan las langs te/ 'phya spong mi snyan pa zer zhing dong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun bi shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir dge slong lnga
371a8(mdo sde): brgya po 'di dag 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la mi mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de
371b1(mdo sde): yang spang bar bya'o zhes zer ba de ni/ lag so leg so// shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pa ni yod pa ma
371b2(mdo sde): yin te/ dmigasu medado// gang yod pa ma yin te/ dmigasu med pa de la blta ba dang mnyan par mi nuso// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spa
371b3(mdo sde): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te/ dmigasu med pas/ gang de'i gnas kyang yod pa ma yin te/ dmigasu med do// 
371b4(mdo sde): gang yod pa yang ma yin te/ dmigasu med pa de ni bsten par bya ba ma yin// de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'ja ma dpal gzhonar gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang
371b5(mdo sde): slar phyogs der log nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal thadag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar mi she so// 'jam
371b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag legaso leg so// de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis bya ste/ dge slong dag 'di la ni kun shes par bya ba med/ rnam par shes par bya ba mdo/ 
371b7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de dbyings ma yin// de ni yod pa ma yin te dmig su
371b8(mdo sde): med cing // g.yo ba med la 'chi 'pho mdo// gang g.yo ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin// gang kun shes par bya ba dang
372a1(mdo sde): // rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med pa de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ sbyin gnas zhes bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na
372a2(mdo sde): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las/ dge slong bzhi brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro'o// dge slong brgya ni sems cher 'khrugs nas lus de nyid dang
372a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bong du lhung // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal khyod sems can rjes su
372a4(mdo sde): srung ba'i chos mi ston pas// dge slong brgya po de dag chung zos te/ mtshar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA
372a5(mdo sde): bu khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dge slong brgya po de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bong der reg pa thang cig reg nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha
372a6(mdo sde): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gal te dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na/ de dag gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal
372a7(mdo sde): bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas/ bskal par sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las/ 
372a8(mdo sde): de yang cung zad cig myong bar byas// shA ri'i bu de'i phyir// dge slong brgya po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par dgra bcom pa zag pa zang par 'gyur/ 
372b1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas// thos pa ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad med pa bzhis na
372b2(mdo sde): lha ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms pas ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu de ma thos par 'khor ba las yongasu
372b3(mdo sde): ma grol/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams las yongasu ma grol
372b4(mdo sde): zhes bshad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam da pal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 2rngam dpal 'di ltar sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i
372b5(mdo sde): phyir/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bsha/ dab ngo mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni bri ba ma yin/ 
372b6(mdo sde): 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas nyon mongs par
372b7(mdo sde): yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmig su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang
372b8(mdo sde): ma yin gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa med// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i mi 'gal ba de byang chu'o// byang chub gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o// thar pa gang
373a1(mdo sde): yin pa rnam par mi rtog go// gang rnam par mi rtog pa de'i mi byed cing 'gyur ba mdo// gang mi byed cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
373a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid ni bri ba ma yin/ 
373a3(mdo sde): 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin// 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
373a4(mdo sde): yin rnam par byang ba ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag yod pa ma yin ning dmig su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas tsa yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang
373a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa med ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo'i tshe tshig/ su bcad pa 'di dge bka' stsal to// 'das pa dag dang sa
373a6(mdo sde): 'ongs dang da ltar byung ba'i chos brjod pas// don gyis ma yin tha snyad tsam 'am// gcig dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid min// mtshan nyid med par gang rtog pa// de dag 'a
373a7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid 'gyur// mtshan nyid med la rtog pa med// rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid min// 'dus ma byas la gang rtog dang // mya ngan 'das la gang rtog pa// gnyis gang bdud tu
373a8(mdo sde): las yin zhes// de na mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad// phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams// de dag ming gis brjod pa ste// ming dang skye med gang yin pa/ de gnyis mtshan nyid gcig
373b1(mdo sde): ba yin/ tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa// de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no// mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste// stong pa ji bzhin spyod yu'o// gang dag rtog pa de dag g.yo// rtag pa med pa g.yon
373b2(mdo sde): med// rtog pa rnams kyis g.yo bar 'gyur// rtog pa med par mya ngan 'da'// gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// de phyir zad pa rjesu thob// de ni rtog
373b3(mdo sde): med ye shes so// ye shes kyis ni ye shes brjod// ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog/ ye shes 'di ltar gang bzod pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// gang gis stong
373b4(mdo sde): gsum 'di dag rnams// rin chen bkang ste byin pa sa// gang gis dam chos 'di 'dra la// bzod pa de ni bzod pa'i mchog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yas/ 
373b5(mdo sde): sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsnyen pas ni// mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs ma yin// chos 'di dang ni theg pa 'ang // yang
373b6(mdo sde): ngag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// mdo sde 'di la rten byas na// thams cad de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum
373b7(mdo sde): ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag/ dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo// gzugs na
373b8(mdo sde): spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri ni bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la/ bla na med pa
374a1(mdo sde): // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
374a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas me tog ces bya bar mang 'thun par 'gyur zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal bzhon
374a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 
374a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs su// zhu chen gyi la tsAb ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus
374a5(mdo sde): gtan la drab// rgya gar skad du/ A nA many+dza shrI ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA na sUtra// ba skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pi zhes bya ba theg
374a6(mdo sde): ba chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal ba
374a7(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na/ dge slong stong nyes brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs
374a8(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
374b1(mdo sde): rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu 'khor ba tsam thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad na 'dzin cing 'dug/ de nas yongasu dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mtshams
374b2(mdo sde): bzangs shes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las langs te/ 
374b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal khyod bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
374b4(mdo sde): mdzad pas/ nga dung thugs mchi ma lags sam// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu zed pas chog par 'dzin par
374b5(mdo sde): 'gyur sam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lga 'i bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho chen po
374b6(mdo sde): lta bu zab cing gting dpag dka' la dpag tu med pa yongasu tshol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nga bya bar 'dod pas
374b7(mdo sde): gzhan yang chog par 'dzin par mi bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tsi la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dam
374b8(mdo sde): pa bzhis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs
